data.text: “Ndaigua ũguo ngoro yakwa ĩgatumatuuma,
Thikĩrĩria! Thikĩrĩria mũraramo wa mũgambo wake,
Arekagĩrĩria rũheni rwake rungu rwa igũrũ guothe
Thuutha waruo gũũkaga mũgambo wa mũraramo wake;
Mũgambo wa Mũrungu ũrurumaga na njĩra ya magegania;
Eeraga tharunji atĩrĩ, ‘Gwa thĩ,’
Nĩatigithagia mũndũ o wothe wĩra wake
Nyamũ nacio nĩciĩhithaga;
Kĩhuhũkanio kiumaga gĩikaro gĩakĩo,
Mĩhũmũ ya Mũrungu nĩĩthondekaga mbarabu,
Nĩaiyũragia matu na ũigũ;
Mathiiaga magĩthiũrũrũkaga
Arehaga matu macio nĩguo aherithie andũ,
“Ayubu, thikĩrĩria ũhoro ũyũ;
Wee nĩũũĩ ũrĩa Ngai aathaga matu,
Wee nĩũũĩ ũrĩa matu macio macuurĩtio wega,
Wee ũringĩkaga nĩ ũrugarĩ wa nguo ciaku
no ũhote kũruta wĩra nake ũhoro-inĩ wa gũtambũrũkia matu mairũ,
“Ta twĩre ũrĩa twagĩrĩirwo nĩ kũmwĩra;
Nĩagĩrĩire kwĩrwo atĩ nĩngwenda kwaria?
Rĩu-rĩ, gũtirĩ mũndũ ũngĩhota kũrora riũa,
Okaga kuuma mwena wa gathigathini arĩ na riiri ukengeete ta wa thahabu;
Ũcio Mwene-Hinya-Wothe-rĩ, tũtingĩhota kũmũkinyĩra,
Nĩ ũndũ ũcio andũ nĩmamũtĩĩte,
